summary: Enhanced Sentry integration across all CurrentMesh projects with comprehensive error tracking, performance monitoring, user context, breadcrumbs, custom tags, error boundaries, React hooks, release tracking, and helper utilities. Added Sentry middleware for backend API routes, database query tracking, external API tracking, error boundaries for frontend, and enhanced configurations for all projects.
current_status: All three projects (marketing site, admin dashboard, backend API) now have maximized Sentry integration with error tracking, performance monitoring, user context, breadcrumbs, custom tags, error boundaries, and release tracking. Backend includes Sentry middleware and helper functions for database queries and external APIs. Frontend includes ErrorBoundary component and React hooks for easy Sentry integration. Release tracking script created for deployment versioning.
